name: HomegearGpio::export
description: This method exports a GPIO. Make sure you have sufficient permissions to do that. If this is not the case, you can set "exportGpios" in /etc/homegear/main.conf. This setting tells Homegear to export the GPIOs when it starts up and before it drops its root privileges.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: The index of the GPIO to be exported
